name: webguerillas
description:
webguerillas, founded in 2000 and still owner-led, is the leading agency for unconventional marketing in Germany and Switzerland. 
We have a strong focus on digital services such as social research, digital strategy, digital word-of-mouth, social crm, homepage/portal building, digital advertising/media, app/mobile marketing, viral campaigns, seeding s. o. 
But we also give services like offline guerilla marketing, buzz events, ambients stunts, alternative pr, or offline word-of-mouth.
